p: MRC-5 cell line (normal human foetal lung fibroblast cell line; ECACC No. 84101801) was grown in cultivation medium (DMEM supplemented with foetal bovine serum in final concentration 10%, and 100 U/mL penicillin/streptomycin) at 37 °C in 5% CO 2. The cells were used at passages between 21 and 26.
